name: Square-Man
description:
This is a 2D platformer where you play as Square Man who explores the world in search of orbs and to solve the puzzles and find secret routes in the levels. The objective is to reach the goal point before the timer runs out. The goal point is in the shape of a glowing white square that is either hidden in the levels or appears after you collect hidden orbs placed in the level.

The Game is authored by Deonte & Angelo
